data.title: William Douglas Jackson (1929-1998)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for William Jackson born 1929 Maysville, Mason, Kentucky, United States died 1998  including ancestors + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:

Died 21 Aug 1998 at age 69 [location unknown]

Problems/Questions

Profile last modified 2 Aug 2024 | Created 20 Jul 2024

This page has been accessed 14 times.

Biography

William Jackson has Appalachian roots, in Kentucky.

William Douglas Jackson was born on July 6, 1929 in Maysville, Mason, Kentucky, United States[1], son of Jerry William Jackson (1905–1974) and Edna O Florence (1908–1993).

In 1930, Wm (age 0) was the son of Jerry Jackson in Maysville, Mason, Kentucky.[2]

In 1940, William (age 10) was the son of Jerry Jackson in Magisterial District 1, Mason, Kentucky.[3]

William died on August 21, 1998, aged 69. He was buried in Calvary Cemetery, Dayton, Montgomery County, Ohio.[4][5][6][7]

William was in an obituary in Dayton, Ohio on 23 August 1998.[8]
